original_text: Instead, when you make a promise, you should say only “Yes, I will do it.” Or you should say only “No, I will not do it.” If you say anything more than this, what you say is bad. It comes from Satan.’
korean_text: 오직 너희 말은 옳다 옳다, 아니라 아니라 하라 이에서 지나는 것은 악으로부터 나느니라

sentences.original_text: Instead, when you make a promise
you should say only 'Yes, I will do it.'
Or you should say only 'No, I will not do it.'
